content.rendered:
Directed by Rohit Shetty

Written by Sanchit Bedre. Vidhi Ghodgaonkar. Yunus Sajawal. Farhad Samji

Cast Deepika Padukone (Meenalochini Azhagasundaram). Jacqueline Fernandez (Bindu). Pooja Hegde (Mala). Ranveer Singh (Roy). Anil Charanjeett (Prem). Sanjay Mishra (Raj Bahadur). Johny Lever (Polson Dada). Murali Sharma (Roy Jamnadas). Siddarth Jadhav (Momo). Nikitin Dheer (Cirkus Roy Joy’s Father). Mukesh Tiwari (Bagheera). Radhika Bangia (Lily). Ashwini Kalsekar (Shakuntala Devi). Varun Sharma (Joy). Pradeep Kabra (Inspector Ram Singh). Vrajesh Hirjee (Nag Mani). Tiku Talsania (Veljibhai). Brijendra Kala (Yusuf). Vijay Patkar (Shankar). Sulabha Arya (Chachi). Krishna Saajnani (Tc). Saurabh Gokhale (Inspector Vikram). Aarti Kulkarni (Roy’s School Teacher). Pratyaksh Panwar (Young Roy). Parag Desai (Bank Manager). Mayank Tandon(Tea Estate Owner), Uday Tikekar (Joy Jamnadas). Rajgopal Iyer (Reddy Anna). Sanchit Bedre (Taxi Driver). Ashish Warang (Mango). Umakant Patil (Chikki). Vanita Harihaaran (Tea Estate Lady (as Vanita Hariharan)). Raaj Gopal (Reddy). Arjun Nagar (Shakuntala’s Husband). Hridansh Gokani (Young Joy). Krishna Panchal (Teenage Joy). Arya Mahajan (Teenage Roy). Supriya Roy (Cirkus Roy Joy’s Mother)

Language Hindi

Producers Rohit Shetty

Production Reliance Entertainment. Rohit Shetty Picturez. T-Series Films
